parameters.content:
# ‚ö†Ô∏è ADVANCED USE ONLY

### üö® This workflow is for advanced users only!

This MCP server contains **71 operations** which is significantly more than the recommended maximum of 40 tools for most AI clients.

### üîç Recommended Alternative
**Seek a simplified MCP server** that utilizes the official n8n tool implementation for Marketcheck APIs if available, as it will be more efficient and easier to manage.

### üõ†Ô∏è Advanced Usage Instructions

**BEFORE adding this MCP server to your client:**
### Disable or delete unused nodes - Review sections and disable/delete those you don't need

**AFTER adding the MCP server to your client:**
1.**Selective tool enabling** - Instead of enabling all tools (default), manually select only the specific tools you need for *that* Workflow's MCP client.
2. **Monitor performance** - Too many tools can slow down AI responses

### üí° Pro Tips
**Keep maximum 40 enabled tools** - Most AI clients perform better with fewer tools
- Group related operations and only enable one group at a time
- Use the overview note to understand what each operation group does
- Consider creating multiple smaller MCP servers for different use cases
- Ping me on [discord](https://discord.me/cfomodz) if your business needs this implemented professionally

### ‚öôÔ∏è Setup Instructions

1. **Import Workflow**: 
Load this workflow into your n8n instance

2. **Configure Authentication**: 
Set up basic credentials

3. **Activate Workflow**:
Enable the workflow to start the MCP server

4. **Get MCP URL**: 
Copy the webhook URL from the MCP trigger

5. **Connect AI Agent**:
Use the MCP URL in your AI agent configuration


### üí° Usage Notes
‚Ä¢ Parameters are auto-populated by AI using $fromAI() expressions
‚Ä¢ With 71 API endpoints available as tools
‚Ä¢ Responses maintain original API structure


### üõ†Ô∏è Customization
‚Ä¢ Add data transformation nodes if needed
‚Ä¢ Implement custom error handling
‚Ä¢ Add logging or monitoring nodes

‚Ä¢ Modify parameter defaults in any HTTP request node as needed

### üí¨ Need Help?
Ping me on [discord](https://discord.me/cfomodz) for integration guidance and custom automations. Check the [n8n documentation](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/sub-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.toolmcp/) for more information.

## üõ†Ô∏è Marketcheck APIs MCP Server ‚úÖ 71 operations

### About
One API serving data spanned across multiple verticals

### üîß How it Works

This workflow converts the Marketcheck APIs API into an MCP-compatible interface for AI agents.

‚Ä¢ **MCP Trigger**: Serves as your server endpoint for AI agent requests
‚Ä¢ **HTTP Request Nodes**: Handle API calls to https://marketcheck-prod.apigee.net/v2
‚Ä¢ **AI Expressions**: Automatically populate parameters via `$fromAI()` placeholders
‚Ä¢ **Native Integration**: Returns responses directly to the AI agent


### üìã Available Operations (71 endpoints)

**Car Search (20 operations)**
get, listing, long, gets, api

**Recall Search (1 operations)**
recall

**Client Filters (2 operations)**
get, set

**Crm Cleanse Api (1 operations)**
crm

**Dealer Api (10 operations)**
dealer, find

**Vin Decoder Api (5 operations)**
epi, neovin, vin, api

**Cars History Api (2 operations)**
get

**Car Cached Image (1 operations)**
fetch

**Heavy Equipment Search (5 operations)**
heavy, long, listing, gets, api

**Motorcycle Search (5 operations)**
motorcycle, long, gets, api

**Rv Search (9 operations)**
rv, long, listing, gets, api

**Cars Market Api (7 operations)**
market, get, predict, price,

**Rank Car Listings (2 operations)**
compute

**Oem Incentive Search (1 operations)**
gets

parameters.toolDescription:
API for auto-completion of inputs

Parameters:
- Query parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ field (required) - Field name for which you want auto-completion
  ‚Ä¢ input (required) - Input entered so far
  ‚Ä¢ include_non_vin_listings (optional) - Flag to indicate whether to include non vin listing terms in results or not. Default is false to avoid un-normalised terms from non vin listings out of results
  ‚Ä¢ ignore_case (optional) - Boolean variable to indicate ignore case of current input
  ‚Ä¢ term_counts (optional) - Boolean variable to indicate wheather to include term counts as well in response
  ‚Ä¢ sort_by (optional) - Sort the response, either by index or count(default)
  ‚Ä¢ seller_type (optional) - seller type for autocomplete

Parameters:

  ‚Ä¢ category (optional) - Filter RV listings on category
  ‚Ä¢ postal_code (optional) - To filter listing on postal code around which they are listed
  ‚Ä¢ mtplm (optional) - To filter rv on mtplm
  ‚Ä¢ sub_category (optional) - To filter rv on their sub-category
  ‚Ä¢ availability_status (optional) - To filter rv on their availability_status
  ‚Ä¢ berths (optional) - To filter rv on their berths
  ‚Ä¢ width_range (optional) - width range to filter listings on width in the range given. Range to be given in the format - min-max e.g. 4-8
  ‚Ä¢ exterior_length_range (optional) - width range to filter listings on exterior_length in the range given. Range to be given in the format - min-max e.g. 4-8
  ‚Ä¢ interior_length_range (optional) - width range to filter listings on interior_length in the range given. Range to be given in the format - min-max e.g. 4-8
  ‚Ä¢ drive_type (optional) - To filter rv on their drive_type
  ‚Ä¢ steering (optional) - To filter rv on their steering
  ‚Ä¢ chassis (optional) - To filter rv on their chassis

  ‚Ä¢ city_mpg (optional) - City mileage of the car

  ‚Ä¢ longitude (optional) - Longitude component of the location

parameters.toolDescription:
Gets oem incentive listings for the given search criteria

Parameters:
- Query parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ offer_type (optional) - The type of the incentive
  ‚Ä¢ msrp (optional) - MSRP range to filter listings with the msrp in the range given. Range to be given in the format - min-max e.g. 1000-5000
  ‚Ä¢ apr (optional) - APR range to filter listings with the msrp in the range given. Range to be given in the format - min-max e.g. 1000-5000
  ‚Ä¢ monthly (optional) - To filter listing on Monthly payment amount, usually populated in Lease offers
  ‚Ä¢ monthly_per_thousand (optional) - To filter listing on monthly amount to be paid by customer for every $1000 financed at the advertised APR rate
  ‚Ä¢ down_payment (optional) - To filter listing on down payment offer on car
  ‚Ä¢ due_at_signing (optional) - To filter listing on total amount due at signing, that usually includes first month payment, down payment, acquisition fee etc
  ‚Ä¢ security_deposit (optional) - To filter listing on security deposit required for the offer
  ‚Ä¢ disposition_fee (optional) - To filter listing on disposition fee of the car
  ‚Ä¢ acquisition_fee (optional) - To filter listing on acquisition fee of the car
  ‚Ä¢ duration (optional) - To filter listing on offer duration in months
  ‚Ä¢ dealer_contribution (optional) - To filter listing on any contribution from dealer's side
  ‚Ä¢ mileage_charge (optional) - Mileage Charge Range range to filter listings with the msrp in the range given. Range to be given in the format - min-max e.g. 100-1000
  ‚Ä¢ mileage_charge_limit (optional) - To filter listing on mileage charge limit the offer is valid up to under the default clauses
  ‚Ä¢ cashback_amount (optional) - To filter listing on cashback amounts listed in offer
  ‚Ä¢ cashback_target_group (optional) - To filter listing on the demographic or any other entity for whom this cashback offer is for. Not all target groups are identified but the most common ones are tagged like Military, Grad students Current owners etc
  ‚Ä¢ lease_end_purchase_option (optional) - To filter listing on amount at the lease end to pay for buying the car
  ‚Ä¢ net_capitalised_cost (optional) - To filter listing on net capitalised cost of the car
  ‚Ä¢ gross_capitalised_cost (optional) - To filter listing on gross capitalised cost of the car
  ‚Ä¢ total_monthly_payment (optional) - To filter listing on gross capitalised cost of the car
